scripts.electron:compile: tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path electron -Filter *.js | ForEach-Object { $newName = $_.FullName -replace '\.js$', '.cjs'; if (Test-Path $newName) { Remove-Item $newName }; Rename-Item $_.FullName -NewName ($_.Name -replace '\.js$', '.cjs') }"
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run electron:compile && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run electron:compile && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run electron:compile && vite build && electron-builder --win --config electron-builder.json
